TopicTitle: Breaking news : UFO Spotted in Kerbin skies !!!

Articles.Content:
Today at 5:17 A%M an UFO was spotted by our well-know astronauts the Kerman brothers. Bill said it was 'Like a big wheel, with an RCS tank on it, and it was spinning, spinning... It climbed into the sky and suddenly disappeared... (Note : It really disappeared : the game crashed)'. Jebediah only said 'THAT WAS MOAR BOOSTERS CLIMBING IN THE SKY !!!'.

Here\'s our pictures :

Err, hum, looks like that our cams failed... We\'ll continue to track this object.

And that\'s the news, from Kerbin Scope !

One of our news helicopters managed to take two shots of the object. It looks like a gravity wheel. The KAF (Kerbin Army Forces) and the Kentagon denies knowledge of a such craft.

It could be an experimental prototype from the space program, so we will interview them as soon as possible.

Stay tuned !

All i can say is

??? 8) and WTF is that!
Sorry to burst your bubble, but the U in UFO means unidentified. If it\'s unidentified, how do you know it was aliens?
Hum... sorry, did I said it was aliens ?

Hum... sorry, did I said it was aliens ?

i guess not.

On an unrelated sidenote, why do I have 3 yellow squares, and you only have one blue?
I don\'t even know what thoses squares means...

The three yellow squares are due to your post count (3 of them) and being a regular user (yellow). The blue square means he is a Volunteer Test Subject as indicated in his title.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
